pageContent:
NAWNEET JHA
 
Phone:	678-644-9978						
Email:	Nawneet.Jha@Gmail.com	
LinkedIn:	www.linkedin.com/in/nawneetjha	
	
DIRECTOR,	R&D,	PRODUCT	DEVELOPMENT
	
As	a	Director	of	R&D	with	18	years	of	experience,	I	specialize	in	designing	scalable,	secure,	and	reliable	products	
focused	on	modern	web	development	technologies.	My	expertise	includes	designing	and	deploying	solutions	in	
both	cloud	and	on-premises	environments,	including	hybrid	models	that	leverage	the	strengths	of	both.	I	am	
dedicated	to	developing	and	executing	product	development	strategies	that	align	with	business	goals,	while	
forecasting	budgets	that	optimize	resources	and	deliver	maximum	ROI.	
I	am	passionate	about	fostering	innovation	and	creativity	within	teams.	In	my	current	role,	I	have	successfully	
managed	multiple	large	teams	of	Architects,	Software	Engineers,	and	Test	Engineers	across	multiple	locations	to

managed	multiple	large	teams	of	Architects,	Software	Engineers,	and	Test	Engineers	across	multiple	locations	to	
deliver	exceptional	products	to	market.	My	leadership	style	is	focused	on	leading	geographically	dispersed	teams	
with	empathy	and	understanding,	while	empowering	team	members	to	excel	and	grow	in	their	roles.	
Overall,	I	have	a	unique	blend	of	technical	expertise,	leadership	skills,	and	strategic	thinking,	with	a	proven	ability	
to	design	and	deliver	innovative	products	that	exceed	customer	expectations.

PROFESSIONAL	EXPERIENCE	
	
HYLAND																																				APRIL	2018	–PRESENT		
	
Projects:	Enterprise	Content	Management	(OnBase/OneContent/Streamline)	
	
DIRECTOR,	R&D	–	PRODUCT	DEVELOPMENT	
	
• Balance	speed,	quality,	and	cost	for	product	release	lifecycle.	
• Set	the	program	vision	and	strategy	by	working	collaboratively	with	product	management,	agility	
enablement,	architect,	and	technical	leaders.	
• Provide	direction	to	R&D	leadership	to	ensure	product	teams	are	executing	towards	the	architectural	vision,	
completing	product	backlog,	and	delivering	quality	products	in	a	timely	manner.	
• Anticipate,	budget,	and	plan	for	needs.	Lead	managers	to	establish	and	maintain	staffing	levels,	training	
plans,	cross	training	initiatives,	performance	requirements	and	equipment	needs.

• Anticipate,	budget,	and	plan	for	needs.	Lead	managers	to	establish	and	maintain	staffing	levels,	training	
plans,	cross	training	initiatives,	performance	requirements	and	equipment	needs.	
• Develop	impactful	and	strategic	partnerships	with	customers	to	drive	business	development.	
• Skilled	in	developing	and	executing	cloud	and	on-premises	strategies	that	align	with	business	objectives	and	
improve	overall	performance,	security,	and	cost-effectiveness.	
• leading	teams	in	designing	and	deploying	AWS	solutions;	experience	in	AWS	services	including	EC2,	S3,	RDS,	
Lambda,	and	Cost	Explorer.	
• Makes	architectural	design	and	coding	recommendations	throughout	development	periods	and	release	
cycle.	
• Work	on	Budget	forecasting	and	head	count	planning	for	future	growth.	
• Established	performance	goals	for	each	department	and	provided	feedback	on	methods	for	reaching	those	
milestones.	
• Experience	in	hiring	and	training	engineers	for	development	teams.

MCKESSON/ALLSCRIPTS																															MAY	2008	–APRIL	2018		
	
Project:	Enterprise	Content	Management/Revenue	Cycle	Management	
	
SOFTWARE	ENGINEERING	MANAGER	
	
• Led	development	team	that	created	Web	and	Mobile	enterprise	solutions	for	Enterprise	Content	
Management.	
• Designed	and	developed	a	complex,	high	performing	document	workflow	solution	for	hospitals	across	the	
globe.	
• Trained	and	managed	team	of	developers	and	discussed	issues	to	provide	resolution	and	apply	best	
practices.	
• Distinguish	product	issues	and	gathere	information	on	customer	experience.	
• Work	with	software	engineers,	to	establish	goals	&	individual	development	plans	and	complete	performance	
review	process.	
• Coordinate	across	departments	to	deal	with	customer’s	issues	and	manage	partner	issues.	
• Proactively	improve	coding,	architecture,	and	development	processes.	
• As	Scrum	Master,	leads	cross-functional	team	to	deliver	software.

• Proactively	improve	coding,	architecture,	and	development	processes.	
• As	Scrum	Master,	leads	cross-functional	team	to	deliver	software.	
• Leads	and	manages	short	and	long-term	Product	strategies	with	cross-functional	partners.	
• Interact	with	clients	to	define	system	requirements	and/or	necessary	modifications.	
• Provide	functional	and	methodology	training	to	new	hire	and	offshore	team.	
 
ORACLE	CORP																								JAN	2007	–	APRIL	2008		
	
Project:	Adverse	Event	Reporting	System	
	
APPLICATION	ENGINEER	(HEALTHCARE	DOMAIN	EXPERT)	
	
• Responsibilities	included	understanding	Requirements	Definitions	Document.	
• Worked	on	migrating	AERS	from	Oracle	Forms/Reports	to	JSP	and	Servlets	using	struts	framework.	
• Developed	Ant	scripts	to	automate	build	process.	
• To	generate	reports	using	BI	Publisher	(XML	Publisher).	
• Worked	on	replacing	PL/SQL	code	with	JAVA/J2EE	code.	
• Worked	on	Agile	software	development.	
• Writing	SQL	and	PL/SQL	for	direct	database	request.

• Worked	on	replacing	PL/SQL	code	with	JAVA/J2EE	code.	
• Worked	on	Agile	software	development.	
• Writing	SQL	and	PL/SQL	for	direct	database	request.	
• Worked	on	Bug	tracking,	bug	fixation	and	enhancement	requests.	
 
SYNTEL	INC																								OCT	2004	–	JAN	2007		
	
Project:	Revenue	Cycle	Management	
	
PROGRAMMER	ANALYST,	TEAM	LEAD	
	
• Worked	as	a	Team	Lead	for	a	team	of	10	members.	
• Had	been	to	client	location	(US)	as	SME	(Subject	Matter	Expert).	
• Involved	in	coding	Service,	Domain	Layers	of	Use	Cases	assigned.	
• Designed,	developed,	and	implemented	customer	requirements	using	Core	Java,	JSP,	and	XML.	
• Taken	ownership	of	some	Modules,	starting	from	coding	Service	and	Domain	Layers.	
• preparation	of	Bills	and	Claims	Data	Model	and	Development	of	EO	and	VO	Designs,	which	is	part	of	Low-
Level	Design	Phase.	
• Worked	on	Waterfall	model	software	development	and	spiral	model. 
 
 
EDUCATION
